reviews.title: Sta Smart watch
reviews.review_text: This is my second smart watch and my favorite!! Easy to use and comfortable. The directions are simple to follow and the watch is easy to learn. Read email, answer calls, take pictures!! This is functional and simple and I would recommend this to everyone and would absolutely buy this watch again. It's good for your teenager on your list as well as any adult, busy mom to busy executive. Health recordings at your fingertips! Sleep patterns etc. very multitasking watch! Very impressive.

reviews.title: A few features not working as expected
reviews.review_text: The CX3 was easy to set up, has a nice large screen (maybe a bit too big for my wrist) and band was a good size for a smaller wrist. For the most part, steps, heart rate, miles are in synch with other tracking apps/watches I am using. I do not like that on the watch, the calories burned are fraction of what my previous watch recorded (e.g. One-hour of yoga my previous watch showed around 250 kcal, this watch recorded 6 kcal) . Also, When I select outdoor walk on the watch, it does not open the walk tracking on the app on my phone and vice versa (again, about 30 minutes walking on watch recorded 66 kcal, app on phone 145 kcal). I also did not receive a verbal notification or vibration when I hit 1-mile as I do on my previous watch. The manual and website do not address these issues. I will likely return the watch but am testing it a few more days.

reviews.title: If its for counting steps don't bother
reviews.review_text: I was very excited about this when I pulled it out. It seemed to have everything I needed. I bought it specifically to see how many steps I walk in a day. I only realized once I got it all set up that you have to set a timer for it to count your steps. It doesn't just automatically count it…..

reviews.title: ehhhhhhh...
reviews.review_text: doesn't stay paired with my phone no matter what I do or how I do it. tried a dozen different times. thankfully I bought it for the clock and stop watch which works appropriately. when I was able to pair my phone, calling and messaging features work great but Everytime I turn the watch off, it disconnected. it's cool that you can easily change the faces and you can customize on the app. notifications come up and you can control which notifications you want to come through, which is nice.

Barely connects or stays connected. got it about 2 weeks ago and only gotten the music part to work once, notifications doesn't connect, even the weather doesnt work half the time, but works as a watch, step counting, heart rate, sleep analysis, and stress rate.

reviews.title: Did not receive what was described.
reviews.review_text: For the most part I like the watch, but what I got was not what was described. Images submitted for review show the actual package and a picture of the screen showing what was promised on the product's page on Walmart. What was promised: 320x380 resolution 500 mAh battery What was received 240x296 resolution 26 mAh battery I'd have given a higher rating but I really hate being lied to. That is unacceptable.

I cannot get the app to download I've tried putting it in manually scan in the barcode and the other code nothing works. it doesn't want to stay on where you can look at anything unless you hold the buttons in I am not happy with this at all would not recommend to anyone.

After a couple of weeks of trying: - it only turns on now, only when button is pressed, but it worked a few times in the beginning by moving the wrist. - Not syncing with app anymore, when I saw that previous data was reset, I deleted the app. - Data didn't show the average for continuous heartbeat, sleep, etc. This is more like a toy. For a real working product I'll have to spend at least $100. You get what you pay for. Duh

reviews.title: Keep Looking! Not as good as it sounds!
reviews.review_text: Price was decent, but you get what you pay for which is basically nothing. Works only when it wants to. Comes with no instructions on how it works. Limited help on the app you have to download to set it up. Screens flash for about a second, can't see what you want to on that amount of time. Nothing that tells what the knobs and buttons do. Watch went beserk the other day after my walk , all I wanted was to check to see if the watch and phone came up with the same amount of steps, wouldn't shut off, I finally turned off the blue tooth! Weather/temp only works when it wants to, even then it's way below the phone readings, which makes me wonder if anything is accurate on this Watch. Should return it, maybe I got a bad one, and never should have got the extended warranty!!

I got this watch to track my steps. Not only is the charging attachment really hard to keep on there to charge, after a couple months the battery won't even charge anymore so I'm stuck with a dead smartwatch that I can't return for my money back. Do not recommend!

reviews.title: not as described
reviews.review_text: This watch doesn't keep time nowhere near as longbas described. I rarely ever connectvit to the app or keep it connected to my phone, and it STILL doesn't hold a charge more than a day. It changes watch faces on me constantly without being connected to my phone, and it doesn't have as many face options as stated. ait was a huge letdown. It is nice looking, but the strap slips from the loops and floos down constantly, as well. I disconnected it from the app. It definitely isn't worth the original price, so I'm glad it was marked way down. I will be returning it.

reviews.title: Bought three, two of the screens have shattered.
reviews.review_text: We bought three of these for our daughters. They are not quite as sensitive to pick up steps as other trackers. Your arm swing has to be a bit exaggerated for them to register. That isn't a big deal. The real issue that we've had is with the screens breaking. We put screen protectors on them because they looked like they might scratch. Despite that when one girl dropped hers on a laminate floor and the screen shattered. Another bumped the side of a chair with hers and it also shattered. A drop of less that three feet breaking it surprised me, and I think that they should be able to survive accidentally running into a chair. They don't seem capable surviving of real life. It is a real disappointment, because they were really nice looking devices that otherwise worked well.

I purchased this smart watch as a birthday present. I gift wrapped the unopened box upon receipt. It was presented as a gift on August 17, 2025. I was so incredibly embarrassed when my son opened this un front of others. The only item in the box was the watch. There were NO instructions. There was no charching cable. Now I am the dissatisfied owner of dead smart watch with no idea of how to operate it if we ever figure out how to charge it. Oh by the way, it is well past the opportunity to return as it was purchased so far prior to the gifting date.

I'm having a lot of problems with this watch. The watch won't stay connected to Bluetooth and the app that you downloaded with it is supposed to have a music app and it doesn't. I feel that this watch is too difficult and it doesn't have the features that it tells me it has.

reviews.title: Amazing watch. Great bargain.
reviews.review_text: This is my first fitness watch of any kind and I am very impressed. Right after it arrived, I went to the gym. It tracked my workout. Then I wore it in the shower and it kept on. Went to the pool and hot tub and it is definitely waterproof! I like the almost 2" screen and its brightness and clarity. Tracks steps, heart rate, sleep and so much more. It also has a hydration and a stretch reminder. And there are still many more functions for me to learn. For the price, this is very impressive!!

I purchased this product online and received it promptly. The instructions that arrive with the watch did not explain how to change the language to English nor did the instructions provide how to set any components of the watch.

reviews.title: False Advertising
reviews.review_text: It claimed to be useful for tracking swim data, which is the entire reason I purchased it. I opened the instructions, and it says do not swim with it, don't even shower with it. I have no use for false advertising.

reviews.title: Just a watch
reviews.review_text: Battery time is horrible, function on watch is the same. I would not recommend purchasing this watch, unless you are just using it for the time and date feature s.
item claims to be waterproof, and includes a swim mode for tracking calories burned while swimming, went swimming with watch on for less than 10 minutes before it fritzed out.

reviews.title: my wrist is damaged bloodshot red
reviews.review_text: it was a lot worse a couple days ago but my skin has swollen up right where the watch sits at it's like I'm having an allergic reaction from device. never had this happen before not sure what the materials made out of but my wrist hurts and itches
Not accurate at all. I walked for a half mile befor it started keeping tract. I was up and moving around for an hour and it said in that hour I was in restful sleep.

reviews.title: Superb Value.
reviews.review_text: If you are considering a basic smart watch, this is a highly affordable "experiment". No problems downloading software, sincing with my iphone. Functions flawlessly.

reviews.title: Works great 😊
reviews.review_text: Watch works great monitors my sleep. My water intake with notification reminders takes my heartbeat my heart rate my steps I get messages and can make phone calls for $19 much better than a Apple Watch for 250.

reviews.title: no Customer Service
reviews.review_text: Worked fine for the first month or so...then woke up one morning to no display. Tried to reach out to STA, the vendor. No response after two weeks. Not so great customer service.
Battery life is horrible. From a full charge it will barely make an 8 hour work day. The band broke after a month, first the pin came out then band clasp.. Would not recommend to anyone with a pulse

reviews.title: CX3 Smart Watch: Sleek, Advanced, and Affordable
reviews.review_text: I recently bought the CX3 Smart Watch, and I have to admit, I’m blown away by how advanced it is. It honestly reminds me of an Apple Watch but at a fraction of the price—and in some ways, it’s even better. The design is sleek, lightweight, and modern, and the display is bright and easy to read. Setting it up was super simple, and the connection to my phone through the Runmifit app was seamless. What really stands out is the Bluetooth calling feature—it works flawlessly, and the sound quality is surprisingly good for a smartwatch in this price range. The fitness tracking is accurate and covers all the basics like steps, heart rate, and calories, which is exactly what I need. The battery life is solid too. I get about two days of use, which is more than I expected given all the features it offers. Overall, this watch completely exceeded my expectations. It looks and feels high-end, performs like a much more expensive smartwatch, and is packed with features. If you’re on the fence about getting it, don’t hesitate—you won’t be disappointed. It’s hands down one of the best purchases I’ve made recently.

reviews.title: It's great if you don't need it to actually track
reviews.review_text: I really wanted this watch to work. It is very cute and has a ton of features along with really great watch faces… it simply doesn't track appropriately. This is the end of a long event day when I wore it next to my Fitbit (which is dead on accurate, I'm only replacing because the battery dies too fast these days) and that's not just a little bit off. That's bananas off. After walking my dog for an hour, it told me I had done 400 steps. I don't think I could trust the heart rate or oxygen levels either. I reached out to the seller with no answer. Huge bummer. It's going back.

reviews.title: Great buy!!!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love mine! It was easy to set up and the battery last longer than I thought, it's a great price for such good quality! I had been looking at it for a bit and I wanted one and couldn't beat the price, I am very happy I went ahead and got it, I am very pleased with it!! Better hurry up and get one while the price stays where it is!!

I loved this item until I didnt. I upholds all the promises it makes until the watch refuses to charge. 🫠 This is the second watch Ive bought from Walmart just for it to stop charging THE DAY TO A MONTH PAST THE WARRANTY RUNNING OUT. My warranty ran out in july and it stopped working over a week ago. Since I have bought 3 seperate charges and docks to try to see if those were the issue. I dont know how it could have been damaged as i immediate put a protector on it, i dont get it wet - even though it claims to be water proof- and still have the same issues as the last watch. You get what you pay for I guess.

reviews.title: Not too fancy. But it's just right for me!
reviews.review_text: Since this is my first smart watch my expectations are not high. It's easy to understand and maneuver through all the options. I was concerned about the battery life. It was dying pretty fast. However, I accidentally figured out how to save the battery life by A LOT! Bring up your list of options. Select Phone Call (turn off). Go back and select Settings ‐ Display - Turn on Wrist Raise (This lights up your watch every time you raise your arm/ wrist). I waited a few minutes, and then turned it off. My battery has been just below full for two days so far. Reducing the vibration or putting it on mute also provides better measurements. Actually, anything I'm not using is turned off until I need it. My only disappointment is the sleep tracker does not give a Last Seven Day Report unless I view it directly in the app. The rotating bezel is a huge plus for my fat fingers. The most valuable feature is the Find Phone. Misplacing my phone occurs many times throughout the day. Don't worry if your phone is on mute. It will continue to vibrate until you find it. Off mute, it sounds off pretty loud. Along with other shortcuts, and decent set of workout videos provided by the app, this was money well spent! I hope this helps.

Awesome Watch, hola charge for a long time have same features as an Apple Watch, people always think is an Apple Watch when I wear it, definitely worth the money, i'm even surprise how cheap it is, don't even look for another one this one you would no regret!!!

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: Doesn't provide a lot of battery life , it's like every three days having to recharge the battery. I thought the battery would last at least a month it doesn't last a week. Sometimes it doesn't keep the information you put in, you to go back and insert the information. When it comes to measuring your blood pressure and stuff I don't know any other way to wear the watch properly to get a reading and that's what the watch keeps saying.

reviews.title: Great smart watch
reviews.review_text: Great buy for my daughter. I wanted something inexpensive she can use and it works great. Works just like my Apple Watch but a fraction of the cost. East to set up to her phone and easy to use. Highly recommend. Shipping was also very fast

reviews.title: Excellent Value
reviews.review_text: For value, this is quite likely the best $20 I have ever spent. I purchased to replace a fitbit versa 3 with minimal expectations. After wearing for a week I am amazed at the quality of this watch. Without a doubt this watch outshines my fitbit in every way. Accurate steps, sleep tracking, blood pressure and heart bpm . My only complaint, mildly, is kcal tracking instead of cal tracking. It's importand to note that this watch needs to be Bluetooth connected thru the app, not thru conventional Bluetooth pairing. If done thru conventional Bluetooth pairing, the connection will be lost. If connected thru the app connection will be maintained.

reviews.title: I'll save you the time don't buy it!
reviews.review_text: cute looking watch a lot of nice features but you have to turn all the features off to be able to wear it for an hour or two with the functions on it kills the battery 2 hours tops! it does not hold a charge .it has the sleep feature but the battery doesn't last more than 6 hours after being fully (with all features off) charged. it spends more time charging then being worn save your money and buy something else.. that you can use the features on

reviews.title: Watch
reviews.review_text: Bought2 in January for me and daughter and started using them in april and by june 7 th mine quit working, otherwise it was an awesome smart watch . Tracked my steps,sleep pattern, heart rate and oxygen .. wish it would have lasted longer asked for replacement from company

The watch screen only shows German which I can not read! Even after the amount of time it required it kept turning off after an hour. After hooking it up with my computer it refused to sync the correct date and time. It is absolutely going back which is even more of a pain as I have no car.

This fitness tracker is so easy to use. I love that I can check my steps, calories burned, and heartrate. I like that I can make phone calls from it, and the call quality is incredibly clear! The different screen faces are so much fun as well. It would be move if it were "more waterproof," but overall I really like all the features, the simplicity, and the look of this!
after a few weeks the watch stopped tracking health data. tried resetting nothing worked. 2 stars bc it wtill works for calls

reviews.title: No call notifications
reviews.review_text: Incoming call notifications are not working. When I'm getting phone calls the watch doesn't notify me at all.
it would measure steps unless hooked up to my blue tooth. When hooked up, my phone didnt have any noise to it(talking from the shows).
I like the watch. Battery life is short lived I have to charge it every other day. But other than that it's a nice watch for $20 bucks!
it had too many features. It kept changing the look for the clock i chose. i don't think bpm was correct.
So many options on my STA smartwatch such as checking my heart rate,keeping track of my steps and sleep patterns,checking my oxygen levels and so much more!
This is the worst item I've ever bought. You have to download something and then download something else and then it still doesn't work. I want to return it.

reviews.title: My Grandson likes it.
reviews.review_text: My Grandson likes it albeit a bit large for his small arm. I set it to connect to my phone (he doesn't have one) but for some reason it will not automatically reconnect. I'm okay with it.

reviews.title: Great watch
reviews.review_text: This watch syncs perfect with my phone. I can answer calls and messages from it. I put my own background. It's a nice watch. I recommend it. Great purchase.
the app doesn't show the ones that come up with the generic and when you try to customize it won't allow the download
Battery will not hold charge very long. You can't wear it even two nights in a row to check sleep patterns because it has to be charged.

reviews.title: cracked glass on front of watch
reviews.review_text: it was broken when i recieved it the front glass was a little cracked on it and it was a gift for someone but i couldnt give with crack on glass threw it away

After two days decided to return and upgrade to Fitbit. Inaccurate sleep tracking. Uses Dafit app, which sucked. Can't change the date format. My favorite thing was the sleek look and comfortable band.

it's is a very pretty watch, but doesn't snyc well with the app. i wore it with my Fitbit and the readings were totally different. i really wanted to like it as I'm trying to find something to replace the Fitbit but this isn't it.

reviews.title: Incorrect step count
reviews.review_text: Incorrect step count, does not seem to record steps consistently. Bluetooth call receive not working, Instructions for setup not easy to follow need more detail.

reviews.title: So worth the money!
reviews.review_text: I have a I phone 15 ProMax. This watch sincs perfect! I can answer calls and messages from it. I put my own background on the face! ( I love that!!). It's is such a nice watch! I highly recommend it!

reviews.title: Exceeded expectations and great price
reviews.review_text: This watch is awesome!!! Can't believe how great it works and for an unbelievable price. Has all the features of much more expensive smart watches at a fraction of the price. Easy to use and easy to pair to phone. HIGHLY RECOMMEND

over all its a good watch for the price, but intitially had some trouble maintaining a connection to my phone ,the battery doesnt last as long as my precious watch and the watch face selection should have more that don't look like they are made for children. Id be happy with a grey face with larger ,easier to read symbols and numbers.
it has all the features i was looking for in a watch, and then some. i love it.
5th watch my family orders, ww love them and will continue to reorder if we need to replace them
